hu.elte.eserial.model

Class Setter

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.elte.eserial.model.Accessor
      • hu.elte.eserial.model.Setter

  • public class Setter
extends Accessor
    Wrapper class for an instance and a setter method. It can invoke the setter, furthermore return the name and the type of the corresponding element.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class hu.elte.eserial.model.Accessor
